intro: Laurentia mariae, commonly known as the Marie's laurentia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. The plant produces distinctive, elongated seed capsules that contain numerous tiny seeds. It is typically found in moist, rocky habitats in temperate regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and sometimes endangered species.
